import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params.id) return ( <> Go back

{product.name}

 ) } export default ProductScreen
